replies.txt_content:
这个插件是跨服聊天
你安装了以后到 config.要么里面把 你的MySQL信息加进去
useMotdForServername: false
servername: theNameYouCalledThisServer

mysql:
   User: username
   Pass: password
   Data: database
   Host: localhost
   Port: 3306
   TableXServers: xservers
   TableXGroups: xgroups
   TableXServersGroups: xservers_xgroups复制代码
